attributes.title: WORST APP EVERRR
attributes.review: this made my phone glitch so much to the point where i had to buy a new phone. my family doesn’t have that much money. delete this app it’s bad

attributes.title: fairies to the rescue 🧚🏾✨

Horrible Horrible Horrible. Dang nabbit awful. It was full of rats, rats everywhere. Almost killed my grams. She bout had a heart attack. Then there were oranges everywhere I looked🍊😤😡. If I could give it a 0 I would!!

attributes.title: Take this app down Apple it’s glitched
attributes.review: this needed to be deleted it gave my phone a potential virus and started to put inappropriate content on my screen

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: Every time I used the app my phone just shut down. The app is very glitchy and so laggy. Not a good app at all it is ruining people’s phone from all over

attributes.title: Very upset

attributes.title: Awful

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: It’s sucked it was insanely glitchy and all that it did was show pictures of a orange baby this app is not making America great again and never will ugh disgraceful

attributes.title: Amazing

attributes.title: Went into Cardiac Arrest😔
attributes.review: The app kept glitching and playing xue hua Piao piao and it struck a nerve in my brain and I couldn’t handle it so I caught a heart attack and accidentally burned down my house. -0.5/10, would not recommend.
